title: Update footer LinkedIn link configuration and hide when unset

requirements.summary: Remove the incorrect hardcoded LinkedIn URL from the footer and render the LinkedIn link only when a valid replacement URL is configured.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer contains any anchor tag with href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/sunil-biradar".
If a valid replacement LinkedIn URL is configured, the footer LinkedIn button/link navigates to that URL in a new tab (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").
If no replacement LinkedIn URL is configured, the LinkedIn icon/link is not shown in the footer (email link remains visible).
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Add a small configuration helper that reads a build-time LinkedIn URL (for example via a Vite env var) and validates it; export a safe value (undefined when missing/invalid) so the footer can hide the LinkedIn link when not configured.

Replace the hardcoded LinkedIn anchor (currently pointing to the incorrect URL) with conditional rendering driven by the configured/validated LinkedIn URL; ensure that when rendered it uses target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer", and when not configured it does not render any LinkedIn link while keeping the email link unchanged.
